sloths have the lowest mobility level of

other words they have zero options when

they can't evade or drive away any
attack so if they're ever discovered by

have only one defensive mechanism their
mediocre stealth it's not even that

there motionless forcing them to keep

unfortunately for sloths players once a

the choice to specialize into consuming
only leaves is the reason they're forced
to min/max keeping their power and
mobility at the minimum possible value
all of their unused evolution points
have to be spent on stealth and
digestion in order to get any value out
of the nutrients but even there there's
a massive flaw in their strategy the
only way sloths can digest the leaves is
because they've spent evolution points
turning the digestive tract into a
suitable habitat for bacteria that can
break down the leaves without these
bacteria sloths can't digest their food
but if it gets too cold the bacteria die
mean that the sloth will starve to death
even on a full stomach
by now I'm sure you're asking why any
